description: All agents have identical activity counts, which may indicate a lack of differentiation in tasks or potential misreporting.
recommendation: Investigate the task allocation and reporting mechanisms to ensure that agent activities are being accurately tracked and differentiated according to their roles.

description: API latency and throughput values are unusually high, which could indicate performance bottlenecks or inefficiencies in the system.
recommendation: Conduct a performance analysis to identify and address any bottlenecks or inefficiencies in the system, particularly focusing on API handling and data processing.

description: The system is not compliant with security standards, which poses a significant risk to data integrity and confidentiality.
recommendation: Immediately review and enhance security protocols to ensure compliance with security standards, including implementing necessary security patches and conducting a security audit.
